column4: yeah...i need to add a line "after all path and environment variables"...should i just add it to the very end of the file?
bash is the default ubuntu shell?
bash is the default shell for users. /bin/sh is a symlink to dash, not bash. Depending on what you mean by "default", one of those sentences is inapplicable.
heh, so much to learn ;) but i meant the first
